newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Informix EPS view cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Informix EPS view cut.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securities Inc said Thursday it cut its fourth quarter earnings estimate for Informix Corp to $0.26 a share from $0.28, based on a $3 million reduction in licensing revenue, mostly from tools, and slight increases in sales and marketing and research and development expenses.
-- It cut its fiscal 1997 earnings estimate to $1.03 a share from $1.05.
-- EVEREN's rating remains market performer for the short term and outperform for the longer term.
-- "We...continue to believe the company has significant growth potential in their new product cycle," EVEREN said in a report.
